Key Match Events: LeBron James scored 11 straight points during a 21-0 run
LeBron James made a key pass to Anthony Davis for the game-winning 3-pointer
Post-Match Reflections: JJ Redick gushed over LeBron's performance
LeBron's decision to stay with the Lakers is highlighted
Others: LeBron James scored 32 points, 14 rebounds, and 10 assists
The Lakers started the season 3-0 for the first time since the 2010-11 season
